item.title: HKG (Hong Kong) on 2025-12-03
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 3, 1800 - 2330 UTCDec 1, 2106 UTCScheduled - We will be performing scheduled maintenance in HKG (Hong Kong) datacenter on 2025-12-03 between 1800 and 2330 UTC.

Traffic might be re-routed from this location, hence there is a possibility of a slight increase in latency during this maintenance window for end-users in the affected region. For PNI / CNI customers connecting with us in this location, please make sure you are expecting this traffic to fail over elsewhere during this maintenance window as network interfaces in this datacentre may become temporarily unavailable.

You can now subscribe to these notifications via Cloudflare dashboard and receive these updates directly via email, PagerDuty and webhooks (based on your plan) https//developers.cloudflare.com/notifications/notification-available/#cloudflare-status.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold vs Huawei Mate XTs est-ce que Samsung a repris la main ?
item.description: Huawei a eu le mérite d'être le premier. Personne ne pourra lui enlever ça. Mais être le premier ne signifie pas être le meilleur. Face au nouveau Galaxy Z TriFold de Samsung, le Mate XTs montre ses limites puissance d'un autre âge, absence de Google et fragilité. Voici pourquoi Samsung reprend la main.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077 va-t-il encore recevoir une mise à jour surprise ?
item.description: CD Projekt Red a peut-être teasé l'arrivée d'une nouvelle mise à jour pour Cyberpunk 2077, qui fêtera ses cinq ans d'existence le 10 décembre 2025.

item.title: Ce rice cooker intelligent signé Xiaomi, testé et validé, coûte moins de 45 € grâce à cette offre
item.description: Si vous rêvez d'un riz parfaitement cuit, sans devoir surveiller une casserole sur le feu, alors c'est un "rice cooker", ou cuiseur à riz, qu'il vous faut. Xiaomi en propose un connecté, le Smart Multifunctional Rice Cooker, que nous avons vraiment apprécié. En ce moment, la marque le propose à 44,99 euros au lieu de 49,99 euros.

item.title: CVE-2025-13696 The Zigaform plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in versions up to,...
item.description: The Zigaform plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in versions up to, and including, 7.6.5. This is due to the plugin exposing a public AJAX endpoint that retrieves form submission data without performing authorization checks to verify ownership or access rights. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive form submission data including personal information, payment details, and other private data via the rocket_front_payment_seesummary action by enumerating sequential form_r_id values. | CVSS Score 5.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2025-10971 Insecure Storage of Sensitive Information vulnerability in MeetMe on iOS, Android allows Retrieve Em...
item.description: Insecure Storage of Sensitive Information vulnerability in MeetMe on iOS, Android allows Retrieve Embedded Sensitive Data. This issue affects MeetMe through v2.2.5. | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-11726 The Beaver Builder – WordPress Page Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Missing Authorizat...
item.description: The Beaver Builder – WordPress Page Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Missing Authorization in all versions up to, and including, 2.9.4. This is due to insufficient capability checks in the REST API endpoints under the 'fl-controls/v1' namespace that control site-wide Global Presets. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level access and above to add, modify, or delete global color and background presets that affect all Beaver Builder content site-wide. | CVSS Score 4.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: Stranger Things saison 5 voici les secrets derrière la transformation hallucinante de Jamie Campbell Bower en Vecna
item.description: Le tournage de la saison 5 de Stranger Things n'a visiblement pas été de tout repos. Pour donner vie à certains personnages, des heures de maquillage ont ainsi été nécessaires. Parmi les personnages concernés, se trouve un antagoniste de taille Vecna.

item.title: ungoogled-chromium
item.description:
Ever wonder what Chromium would be like if it completely severed its ties with Google? Not just the sync and account features, but all the background pings, proprietary codecs, and services baked into the core? Thataposs exactly what Ungoogled-Chromium sets out to answer.
GitHub Repository https//github.com/ungoogled-software/ungoogled-chromium

item.title: A curated list of innovative and impactful project ideas for final-year students, covering AI, susta...

A curated list of innovative and impactful project ideas for final-year students, covering AI, sustainability, health, education, and more
GitHub Repository https//github.com/DharminJoshi/Final-Year-Project-Ideas-2025

item.title: Amazon veut remplacer les supermarchés avec la livraison en 30 minutes
item.description: Dans sa ville natale de Seattle et à Philadelphie, Amazon cherche à repousser les limites de la livraison ultrarapide avec la promesse d’une commande sur le pas de votre porte en 30 minutes. De quoi rapprocher le site des services de courses en ligne.

item.title: An in-browser game that teaches core Vim motions and editing commands
item.description:
Letaposs be honest learning Vim can feel like trying to learn to drive a manual transmission while the car is already rolling downhill. The payoff is huge—blazing fast text navigation and editing—but the initial learning curve is steep. Most tutorials have you memorizing commands in a vacuum, which do...

item.title: Multiple USB File Flasher
item.description:
If youaposve ever needed to create a bunch of bootable USB drives—for a workshop, a classroom, or deploying machines—you know the pain. Itaposs a serial process flash one drive, wait, eject, insert the next one, repeat. Itaposs a massive time sink. What if you could just plug in a handful of drives and flas...
GitHub Repository https//github.com/pop-os/popsicle

item.title: Pourquoi le Galaxy Z Fold 7 est déjà mort
item.description: C'est violent. En dévoilant son Galaxy Z TriFold, Samsung n'a pas seulement répondu à Huawei. Le constructeur coréen vient, peut-être sans le vouloir, de tirer une balle dans le pied de son actuel flagship, le Galaxy Z Fold 7. Sorti il y a à peine six mois, le format "livre" prend soudainement un terrible coup de vieux.

item.title: A complete video subtitle editing React component with AI-powered speech recognition and visual edit...
item.description:
Editing video subtitles is one of those tasks that can quickly become tedious. Youaposre juggling timestamps, text alignment, and trying to keep everything in sync. What if you could skip the manual transcription and have a visual, intuitive interface for the whole process? Thataposs exactly what Flycut C...

item.title: Bon plan home-cinéma -110 € sur le vidéoprojecteur Xgimi MoGo 2 Pro avec Full HD + Google TV en bundle avec son support inclinable
item.description: Le Xgimi Mogo 2 Pro est un vidéoprojecteur Full HD, ici accompagné de son pied inclinable, à retrouver pour 369 euros au lieu de 479 euros sur Boulanger.

Most options lock your data into a platform or come with a hefty subscription. What if you could just host your own advent...

On Windows, that level of deep customization has always felt a bit out of reach, locked behind system restrictions and limited third-party tools. Thatapos...

If you live in Neovim, youaposve probably felt the pull of AI coding assistants. Theyaposre powerful, but constantly switching between your editor and a browser tab can shatter your flow. What if that assistant lived right inside your editor, context-aware and ready on demand? Thataposs exactly the promise o...

item.title: Scanner des QR Code avec une seule main sera enfin très bientôt beaucoup plus facile
item.description: Le scanner de codes QR intégré à Android se transforme à nouveau après un premier déploiement durant l’été 2025, rapidement interrompu, cette refonte revient progressivement sur les smartphones compatibles via une mise à jour des services Google Play.​ Son butnbsp faciliter le flashage de QR code avec une seule main.

item.title: Edit PDF files with Nano Banana
item.description:
Letaposs be honest, editing PDFs is usually a chore. You either need a heavyweight desktop application, a subscription to an online service, or youaposre stuck trying to finagle a Word document export. So when I saw a project called quotNano Bananaquot that lets you edit PDFs directly in the browser, I was imme...
GitHub Repository https//github.com/gavrielc/Nano-PDF

item.title: « Le pliant définitif », première prise en main du Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold
item.description: Oubliez tout ce que vous savez sur le Z Fold 7. Le Galaxy Z TriFold arrive et il change les règles du jeu. Écran immense de 10 pouces, mode DeX natif et… un chargeur dans la boîte (incroyable, non ?). Mais attention, à près de 3000 dollars, la moindre rayure sur cet écran ultra-tendre va vous coûter très cher. Un des premiers YouTubers a mis la main dessus.

item.title: A tool to snap pixels to a perfect grid. Designed to fix messy and inconsistent pixel art generated ...
item.description:
If youaposve ever tried using AI to generate pixel art, you know the frustration. You get a cool concept, but the pixels are a mess—misaligned, inconsistent, and nowhere near a clean grid. It looks okay at a glance, but zoom in and the imperfections drive you nuts. Manually fixing it is tedious, often ...
GitHub Repository https//github.com/Hugo-Dz/spritefusion-pixel-snapper

item.title: La nouvelle Insta360 X4 Air devient déjà plus légère au niveau de son prix
item.description: Meilleure que la X4 et plus abordable que la X5, l'Insta360 X4 Air s'affirme comme un parfait compromis entre les deux modèles et Boulanger baisse son prix de 40 euros. Elle est désormais affichée à 359,99 euros contre 399,99 euros habituellement.
item.category: Bons plans photos, vidéos et drones

item.title: CVE-2025-12483 The Visualizer Tables and Charts Manager for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL In...
item.description: The Visualizer Tables and Charts Manager for WordPress plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to SQL Injection via the 'query' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.11.12 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database. Version 3.11.13 raises the minimum user-level for exploitation to administrator. 3.11.14 fully patches the vulnerability. | CVSS Score 6.5 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2025-13007 The WP Social Ninja – Embed Social Feeds, Customer Reviews, Chat Widgets plugin for WordPress is vul...
item.description: The WP Social Ninja – Embed Social Feeds, Customer Reviews, Chat Widgets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting in all versions up to, and including, 3.20.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on externally-sourced content. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page, granted they can post malicious content to a connected Google Business Profile or Facebook page. | CVSS Score 6.1 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2025-13140 The SurveyJS Drag Drop WordPress Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Re...
item.description: The SurveyJS Drag Drop WordPress Form Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 1.12.20. This is due to missing nonce validation on the SurveyJS_DeleteSurvey AJAX action. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete surveys via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link. | CVSS Score 4.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2025-13685 The Photo Gallery by Ays plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all ver...
item.description: The Photo Gallery by Ays plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 6.4.8. This is due to missing nonce verification on the bulk action functionality in the 'process_bulk_action()' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to perform bulk operations (delete, publish, or unpublish galleries) via a forged request granted they can trick an administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link. | CVSS Score 4.3 (MEDIUM)

item.title: Xreal dévoile les lunettes 1S, les premières au monde à faire une conversion vidéo 2D en 3D automatique et en plus elles sont abordables
item.description: Le fabricant chinois de lunettes de réalité augmentée lance un nouveau modèle d'entrée de gamme doté d'une technologie inédite capable de transformer instantanément les contenus 2D en expériences tridimensionnelles. C’est une première mondiale et cerise sur le gâteau, le prix n’est pas exorbitantnbsp!

item.description: Une seule application gratuite pour éditer tous vos documents voici la promesse de l'application OnlyOffice Documents et de son interface pensée pour les interfaces tactiles.

item.title: La nouvelle Google Pixel Watch 4 profite enfin d’une première baisse de prix (-20 %)
item.description: Dévoilée cet été, la Google Pixel Watch 4 est une montre connectée premium précise, complète et qui a même bénéficié de quelques améliorations. Et elle affiche enfin un prix réduit Amazon et Darty la proposent à 329 euros au lieu de 399 euros.

item.description: Toujours empêtré dans son retard sur l’IA générative, Apple va bousculer son organigramme en embauchant un ancien responsable de chez Google pour remplacer John Giannandrea.

item.description: The donation WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not sanitize and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, allowing high privilege users, such as admin to perform SQL injection attacks | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-13387 The Kadence WooCommerce Email Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scrip...
item.description: The Kadence WooCommerce Email Designer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the customer name in all versions up to, and including, 1.5.17 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. | CVSS Score 7.2 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2025-13606 The Export All Posts, Products, Orders, Refunds Users plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-...
item.description: The Export All Posts, Products, Orders, Refunds Users plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 2.19. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on the `parseData` function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to export sensitive information including user data, email addresses, password hashes, and WooCommerce data to an attacker-controlled file path on the server via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link. | CVSS Score 6.5 (MEDIUM)

item.description: La course au "Tri-Fold" est lancée. Quelques mois après le choc Huawei Mate XT, Samsung réplique enfin. Le Galaxy Z TriFold n'est pas un prototype c'est un monstre de puissance avec Snapdragon 8 Elite et une charnière en titane. Mais attention, la facture risque d'être salée.

item.title: CVE-2024-45675 IBM Informix Dynamic Server 14.10 could allow a local user on the system to log into the Informix se...
item.description: IBM Informix Dynamic Server 14.10 could allow a local user on the system to log into the Informix server as administrator without a password. | CVSS Score 8.4 (HIGH)

item.title: CVE-2025-12529 The Cost Calculator Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file deletion due to ins...
item.description: The Cost Calculator Builder plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file deletion due to insufficient file path validation in the deleteOrdersFiles() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.6.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary file paths into the orders that are removed, when an administrator deletes them. This can lead to remote code execution when the right file is deleted (such as wp-config.php). This vulnerability requires the Cost Calculator Builder Pro version to be installed along with the free version in order to be exploitable. | CVSS Score 8.8 (HIGH)

This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page. | CVSS Score 6.4 (MEDIUM)

item.description: In Modem, there is a possible system crash due to improper input validation. This could lead to remote denial of service, if a UE has connected to a rogue base station controlled by the attacker, with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID MOLY01673751 Issue ID MSV-4644. | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-20763 In mmdvfs, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to...
item.description: In mmdvfs, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege if a malicious actor has already obtained the System privilege. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID ALPS10267218 Issue ID MSV-5032. | Severity UNKNOWN

item.title: CVE-2025-21072 Out-of-bounds write in decoding metadata in fingerprint trustlet prior to SMR Dec-2025 Release 1 all...
item.description: Out-of-bounds write in decoding metadata in fingerprint trustlet prior to SMR Dec-2025 Release 1 allows local privileged attackers to write out-of-bounds memory. | CVSS Score 5.7 (MEDIUM)

item.description: Improper export of android application components in Dynamic Lockscreen prior to SMR Dec-2025 Release 1 allows local attackers to access files with Dynamic Lockscreen's privilege. | CVSS Score 6.2 (MEDIUM)

item.title: CVE-2025-55129 HackerOne community member Kassem S.(kassem_s94) has reported that username handling in Revive Adser...
item.description: HackerOne community member Kassem S.(kassem_s94) has reported that username handling in Revive Adserver was still vulnerable to impersonation attacks after the fix for CVE-2025-52672, via several alternate techniques. Homoglyphs based impersonation has been independently reported by other HackerOne users, such as itz_hari_ and khoof. | CVSS Score 5.4 (MEDIUM)
